channel.title: The7 News Demo
channel.description: Just another The7 - Ultimate WordPress Theme Sites site

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to The7 - Ultimate WordPress Theme Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
